name: What is Chrome Dev Summit Extended?
des: It is a follow up event of Chrome Dev Summit. The Web plays a special role here, and through Chrome Dev Summit Extended, we want to take a moment to allow web developers to come together, share their stories and acknowledge the latest in the platform and tools.

name: What are GDGs?
des: GDGs are focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies.

name: Who can register for CDS Extended?
des: Anyone with the passion of learning, who’s fond of technology, passionate programmers , everybody can register and attend.

name: Is it mandatory to register to participate in the event?
des: It will be great if you may register so that the important announcements will be there with you without any fail.

name: I’m a beginner in programming. Can I still register?
des: Yes. The team has taken care of the beginners while designing the content of the event.

name: What will attendees get by participating in the event?
des: A pool of knowledge and a satisfaction of learning something new. And wait! There are a few surprises as well.

name: How can I communicate my queries?
des: You may reach out to us at our email at: webdevsindia@gmail.com
